attributes.action: Let all schools and pupils wear whatever they want on a friday
attributes.additional_details: So that we wear what we want on the last day of school
attributes.background: Make it so children can wear any clothes they want on a friday

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about whether to require students to wear school uniform on Friday are a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Ban compulsory school uniforms: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/639304
